entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:14PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot This Weekend for the North Slope and Arctic Coast... A dry and hot chinook wind will develop across the Brooks Range late Friday into Sunday. entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued August 03 at 12:32PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Monsoonal Moisture Continues Chance for Isolated Flash Flooding... High pressure over the southern United States is bringing in Pacific moisture. High values of precipitable water (moisture) are presently over central and western Wyoming and are expected to continue through the weekend. Highest rain totals are expected across western and northern Wyoming.
